statement.p: In 38.3 of the last 47 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{47}}={0.383}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{47}. \displaystyle{P}={0.383}\cdot{47}={18.001}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 47-18.001=28.999 We round that as requested to 29.
